The view of the self is the desire realm's view-severance afflictions, and there are thirty-two cultivation-severance afflictions.
The form realm's view-severance afflictions are twenty-eight, and there are three cultivation-severance afflictions.
The formless realm is also the same.
The three realms together total ninety-eight.
It is said that the four truths are established by the sixteen aspects, which are distinguished by the sixteen gates.
The sixteen gates are:
the four aspects under each of the four truths.
The four aspects of the truth of suffering are impermanence, suffering, emptiness, and non-self.
The four aspects of the truth of accumulation are cause, accumulation, production, and condition.
The four aspects of the truth of cessation are cessation, purity, subtlety, and separation.
The four aspects of the truth of the path are path, suchness, practice, and exit.
The commentary says:
Because there is arising and cessation, it is impermanent.
Because of the nature of oppression, it is suffering.
Because it contradicts the view of what belongs to the self, it is empty.
Because it contradicts the view of the self, it is non-self.
Because it can produce dharmas, it is a cause.
Because there are many kinds, it is an accumulation.
Because it always assists in production, it is production.
Because it individually helps, it is a condition.
Because the aggregates are exhausted, it is cessation.
Because the three characteristics cease, it is pure.
Because there are no afflictions, it is wonderful.
Because it is free from calamities, it is liberated.
Because it is the meaning of the path, it is the way.
Because it accords with right principle, it is suchness.
Because it correctly heads towards, it is practice.
Because it is able to transcend forever, it is exit.
There are four knowledges regarding the truth of suffering:
1. Patience towards the Dharma of suffering.
2. Knowledge of the Dharma of suffering.
3. Patience of the same type as suffering.
4. Knowledge of the same type as suffering.
It counteracts the ten kinds of afflictions such as the view of self and so forth.
The other three truths are also like this.
Patience towards the Dharma of accumulation, knowledge of the Dharma of accumulation, patience of the same type as accumulation, knowledge of the same type as accumulation.
It counteracts the seven kinds of latent tendencies such as wrong views and so forth.
Patience towards the Dharma of cessation, knowledge of the Dharma of cessation, patience of the same type as cessation, knowledge of the same type as cessation.
It counteracts the afflictions regarding the truth of cessation.
Patience towards the Dharma of the path, knowledge of the Dharma of the path, patience of the same type as the path, knowledge of the same type as the path.
It counteracts the afflictions regarding the truth of the path.
As for the afflictions to be eliminated through cultivation,
one compares and has patience towards and knowledge of the four truths.
It counteracts the four afflictions of desire, anger, pride, and ignorance in the desire realm.
